title: [Works]
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: There is a corner of the policy of Hermiston, where you come suddenly in view of the summit of Black Fell, sometimes like the mere grass top of a hill, sometimes (and this is her own expression)  like a precious jewel in the heavens.

title: Weir of Hermiston. An unfinished romance. [With an editorial note signed, S. C., i.e. Sidney Colvin.]
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
